summary: 1995 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE, 318V8 ALL TIME-ALL WHEEL DRIVE.  294 TRANSFER CASE.  59,900 MILES. VEHICAL NOT USED TO TOW ANYTHING.  VISCUS COUPLER IS FAILING, CAUSING WHEELS TO LOCK UP.  VISCUS COUPLER ALLOWS FRONT WHEELS TO ROTATE AT DIFFERANT SPEED WHEN WHEELS ARE TURNED.  WHEN WHEELS START TO LOCK UP, THIS CAN AND WILL BE POTENTIALY DANGEROUS.  I HAVE CONFIRMED MANY COMPLAINTS FROM SCHAEFER MOTOR SALES, 8320 WASHINGTON AVE., RACINE,WI. 53406.  (262)-886-6800.  CHRYSLER JEEP NEEDS TO DO A RECALL!!  PLEASE ADVISE ASAP.  THANK YOU.     *JB
